1370: Huwardo moved to Uterechse straet.A.8 after marriage.
Got married to Suaneka at age 35 in 1370.
1372: Had a daughter with Suaneka, Suaneka, at age 37.
Lost daughter Suaneka when Suaneka was 1 years old.
1373: Had a daughter with Suaneka, Ymmekine, at age 38.
1375: Had a daughter with Suaneka, Natelien, at age 40.
Lost daughter Natelien when Natelien was 1 years old.
1379: Had a daughter with Suaneka, Amalburga, at age 44.
Became caretaker of Ymmekine, Amalburga at age 45.
